name: Sagitarius
description: Sagitta, known as Sagittarius, is the god of freedom and adventure, a masterful archer and bold pioneer.

skills.name: Aurora Arrow
skills.description: Deals DMG equal to 240% of ATK to the target and increases ATK by 15% for 7s.

upgrades.level2: Grants 10% Lifesteal for the duration. (Unlocks at Lv.21)

skills.name: Archer's Instinct
skills.description: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with HP below 50% by 20%.

upgrades.level2: Total DMG increases to 25%. (Unlocks at Lv.81)
upgrades.level3: Total DMG increases to 30%. (Unlocks at Lv.141)

skills.name: Piercing Rush
skills.description: Charges toward the current target, dealing DMG equal to 220% of ATK to enemies along the path. After a brief delay, returns to deal DMG equal to 220% of ATK again to enemies along the path.

upgrades.level2: Reduces hit targets' Armor by 20% for 5s. (Unlocks at Lv.41)
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG dealt to 250%. (Unlocks at Lv.101)
